title: Minha Vida em Marte
overview: Fernanda is married to Tom, with whom she has a five-year-old daughter, Joana. The couple is in the midst of wear and tear caused by living together for many years, which generates constant friction. Who helps Fernanda to overcome the crisis is her partner An√≠bal, inseparable partner during the arduous journey between saving the marriage or putting an end to it.
